DOC.brief_title: The Effects Kinesio Tape Application With Different Verbal Input Given With Patients With Rotator Cuff Tear
DOC.detailed_description: Rotator cuff tear common shoulder pain functional limitation . Kinesio tape ( KT ) frequently use conservative treatment shoulder pathology . Even study show KT effective pain , think due positive thought patient KT . The aim study investigate effectiveness KT application different verbal input pain , function range motion ( ROM ) patient rotator cuff tear . 97 patient ( Group 1 , n=32 ; Group 2 , n=33 , Group 3 , n=32 ) randomize 3 group accord verbal input give patient effectiveness KT ; Group 1 ( limited evidence KT effective ) , Group 2 ( know KT effective ) , Group 3 ( know KT excellent result ) . The standard KT apply 3 group . The rest , night pain activity assess Visual Analog Pain Scale ( VAS ) , 30 min 24 hour KT application . ROM assess goniometer function evaluate Disabilities Arm , Shoulder Hand ( DASH ) American Shoulder Elbow Surgery score ( ASES ) 24 hour KT application . Minimal clinically important difference effective calculated assessment use study .
DOC.criteria: Patients include study partial rotator cuff tear diagnose clinical ground No episode shoulder instability No radiographic sign fracture glenoid great less tuberosity MRI evidence cuff tear Duration symptom least 3 month , Inadequate response nonoperative management ( include nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug , physical therapy , rest , 1 local corticosteroid injection ) Positive empty test indicate possible supraspinatus involvement Positive HawkinsKennedy test indicate possible external impingement , Subjective complaint difficulty perform activity daily live 20 50 year age . Patients exclude study inflammatory joint disease Rheumatologic disease Osteoarthritis humerus head Prior surgery affect shoulder Inability complete questionnaire language problem cognitive disorder Shoulder girdle fracture Glenohumeral dislocation/subluxation Acromioclavicular sprain Concomitant cervical spine symptoms A history shoulder surgery Patients accept participate Patients come second evaluation .
